edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component.GraphElement
      • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component.Edge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<GraphElement>

    public class Edge
extends GraphElement
    Edge graph object. Connects two Nodes, and can be directored or undirected. For undirected graphs, "source" and "destination" are meaningless.
    Author:
    Jason Cockrell, Ty Devries, Alex McCabe, Michael Owoc, with major modifications by Matthias Stallmann.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.graph.component.GraphElement

        COLOR, DELETED, dispatch, graph, HIDDEN, HIDDEN_LABEL, HIDDEN_WEIGHT, HIGHLIGHTED, ID, LABEL, states, WEIGHT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Edge(Graph graph)
      When an edge is created during parsing and source, target and id are not known.
      Edge(Graph graph, int id, Node source, Node target)
      To add an edge while editing or during algorithm execution: id, source and target are known at the time.
